posts.post_title: FS - T206 Harry Lord EPDG SGC 1
posts.post_content: For Sale - T206 Harry Lord EPDG SGC 1 - $140 venmo no fee or $145 pp gs.  Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents please add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover shipping.
